letters.description: Comprehensive assessment of the individual's unique neuro-profile, including sensory processing, cognitive strengths, and communication style.
Establish sensory safety and emotional regulation strategies to create a secure physiological foundation for learning and connection.
Tailor coaching and social engagement techniques to match the specific neurotype, avoiding one-size-fits-all behavioral approaches.
Modify physical, social, and academic/work spaces to minimize cognitive load and remove barriers to participation.
Collaboratively develop neuro-affirming objectives that prioritize autonomy, quality of life, and personal interest over neuro-typical conformity.
Equip the individual and their support network with the tools and confidence for long-term self-advocacy and systemic inclusion.
